explanation: An air map of the area is crucial for navigating the vast and featureless Atacama Desert, providing the necessary information to locate the mining camp and avoid aimless wandering. Without a clear understanding of the terrain, it is significantly harder to make informed decisions about the best route to take, increasing the risk of dehydration and heat stroke. The knowledge from the map greatly enhances our chances of finding the mining camp efficiently, ensuring faster access to potential rescue or help.
